featured.text: Z: Ari will be a superagent running the same company.
Interviewer: You’re the older brother of Rahm, the mayor of Chicago, and Ari, an extremely successful talent agent.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於音樂的術語，通常指一段獨唱的旋律，特別是在歌劇或其他音樂作品中。
definition.en_def: A term used in music, typically referring to a solo vocal piece, especially in operas or other musical works.
definition.example: The soprano performed a beautiful aria during the opera.
